DOC.criteria: Diagnosis relapsingremitting MS ( RRMS ) relapse secondary progressive MS ( SPMS ) Neurologically stable Screening , investigator 's judgment actively experience recover recent relapse 30 day precede Screening Visit A Kurtzke Expanded Disability Status Scale ( EDSS ) score 1.0 6.0 , inclusive Screening Visit High mixed affinity binder TSPO , determine rs6971 polymorphism genotyping screen Diagnosis primary progressive nonrelapsing secondary progressive MS Smoking 10 cigarette per day use nicotine patch Known history , positive screen test result hepatitis C virus hepatitis B virus Varicella herpes zoster virus infection severe viral infection within 6 week Screening Any type live virus vaccine 4 week randomization History abnormal laboratory result
